thread.title: Liverpool and Everton target Gustavo Viera reveals he’d love to emulate his idols Luis Suarez and Didier Drogba by becoming a Premier League star
thread.title_full: Liverpool and Everton target Gustavo Viera reveals he’d love to emulate his idols Luis Suarez and Didier Drogba by becoming a Premier League star

author: ituckey
title: Liverpool and Everton target Gustavo Viera reveals he’d love to emulate his idols Luis Suarez and Didier Drogba by becoming a Premier League star
text:
EFL VIERA WANTS TO BE DROGBA Liverpool and Everton target Gustavo Viera reveals he’d love to emulate his idols Luis Suarez and Didier Drogba by becoming a Premier League star 
Uruguay prodigy, 16, enjoys watching the Prem on TV, supports Chelsea and already plays for a team called... LIVERPOOL Exclusive
